FuncDef:
The alarm occur time command sets an alarm generation anti-jitter time.
The undo alarm occur time command restores the default alarm generation anti-jitter time.
By default, the default alarm generation anti-jitter time is 2500 milliseconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an alarm generation anti-jitter time.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 30000, in milliseconds. The step is 500. For example, the value can be 500, 1000, or 1500.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a device detects that a fault alarm is generated without the time specified in the alarm finish time command from clearing alarm reporting, the device immediately reports a fault generation alarm.If a device detects that a fault alarm is generated within the time specified in the alarm finish time command from clearing alarm reporting, the device reports a fault generation alarm after the time specified in the alarm occur time command elapses.

Prerequisites
An MD and an MA have been configured using the cfm md and ma commands, respectively.
